title: iyarkkaiyuLLE ilagum
sahitya:
iyarkkaiyuLLE ilagum IshanE en idayattuLLE vandu pEshinAn


anupallavi

  tayakkaminri mayakkaminri vazhiyirk-karumam sheyyena


caraNam    andi vELai sandittennai �amaidi amaidi amaidi� enrE
aruNOdaya naghai purindE karuNai karuNai karuNai enbAn
allum paghalumAi sellum kAlattEri uLLapaDi iru nalladurum enrE
